#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
    char str[50];
    int test,i,len,mid;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test)
    {
        scanf("%s", str);
        len=-1;
        while(str[++len]);
        mid=len/2;
        i=mid-1;
        while(i>=0)
            printf("%c",str[i--]);
        i=len-1;
        while(i>=mid)
            printf("%c",str[i--]);
        printf("\n");
        test--;
    }
    return 0;
}
